content:
You have an Azure virtual machine
named VM1 that runs Windows
Server 2016.
You need to create an alert in Azure
when more than two error events are
logged to the System event log on
VM1 within an hour.
Solution: You create an event
subscription on VM1. You create an
alert in Azure Monitor and specify
VM1 as the source
Does this meet the goal?
Select the correct answer
True
False
